tool_description: API to serve information about stars and planets scraped from wikipedia. Get to know over 200 stars and surrounding planets, in just a few lines of code.
name: Stars API
title: Stars API

api_list.name: Star
api_list.description: returns full information about the star.

api_list.name: Stars list
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stars-api.p.rapidapi.com/starslist"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stars-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stars-api.p.rapidapi.com/starslist"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stars-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
